data.title: GEORGE GROSS AWARD
data.meta_description: The George Cross-- the highest military decoration awarded by the Governor-General (Sir William Mckell) at an Admiralty House investiture today-- was received by the sister of a soldier ...
data.text:
The George Cross— the highest military'

decoration awarded by the Governor-General (Sir

William Mclcell) at an Admiralty House invests

ture today — -was received by the sister of a soldier

who was killed during the Japanese uprising at

Cowra Prison Camp in 1944.

Miss Beatrice Hardy, Mowbray Rd., "Willoughby ,

received the decoration on behalf of her brother , Pte.

Beniamin Cower Hardv, A.M.F.

Pte. Hardy was killed

when he seized

the lock of a Vickers

machine - gun wheih

the Japanese had cap

tured, and prevented

them from turning the

gun on Australian

troops.

His Excellency presented

Service and civilian awards
